info: Well, that took a while but now the entire site has been converted to 11ty! -/ ~~New site layout as well! More styles and decoration will be added later sometime.~ ~~OCs page redone, although I'm not really satisfied with the current design.~ /-
Blog page added! Finally, a place where I can let out some thoughts from my head.
Gallery has been improved with EZ Gallery! -/ ~~I'll need to find a way to add descriptions to each image.~ /-
Added more sites to the Sites page!
Gallery has been improved with status.cafe!
Readded the classic (pre-overhaul) styles back to the styleswitcher.
Added some links in the Sites page.
Added a sitemap.
Replaced the TF2 Heavy placeholders in the 404 page.
Added a Christmas theme to the site! It might not be good for now, but I'll improve it later!
Added some sites in the Sites page.
Added more sites!
Rewritten the About Me page again.
Slightly tweaked the OCs page. I might begin to work on and archive some information there.
Added a site to the Sites page.
Added three sites on the Sites page.
Sorry for the sudden prolonged inactivity here. IRL stuff and no coding motivation made me go away for a bit.
Added blog post pagination navigation to the top of every post for convenience.
Added a small decorational card in the About me page.
New page: Webcomics!
Site's code has gone through a slight rewrite. -/ ~~Mostly backend stuff, such as the changelog now condensed into a single JSON file.~ ~~It honestly looks a bit terrible; the parsing code.~ /-
Sites in the Sites page will have a red border around it if the site no longer exists.
Webcomics link added to mobile nav.
The map of Aethepor is finally interactable with the use of SVG. Individual pages do not exist, yet. -/ ~~Formerly used <map>, but that does not respond to screen sizes without the use of JS.~ /-
